Title: Register of heroes -- An Ke
Publisher: Zhongguo qingnian chubanshe (中国青年出版社)
Notes: An Ke (1959-1983) was born in a revolutionary cadre family in Guangzhou, Guangdong Province. In 1983, he was seriously injured and died after a fight with gangsters. Later he was regarded as a revolutionary martyr and was awarded the title of "Model Communist" and "Excellent Journalist".
Theme: An KeModels and MartyrsSocialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)
